rows.segment_description: Google Cloud is a reportable segment of Alphabet Inc. that provides enterprise cloud services and solutions. This segment includes infrastructure, platform, and other services for businesses to build, deploy, and operate applications on the cloud. The segment's performance is reported separately from Google Services and Other Bets.

Segment Profitability We report our segment results as Google Services, Google Cloud, and Other Bets. Additionally, certain costs are not allocated to our segments because they represent Alphabet-level activities. For further details on our segments, see Part I, Item 1 Business and Note 15

rows.segment_description: Google Services is a core segment of Alphabet Inc. encompassing a broad range of products and services, including search, advertising, and consumer platforms. This segment generates revenue from Google Search & other, YouTube ads, Google Network, and Google subscriptions, platforms, and devices. It represents the majority of Alphabet's business operations.

rows.segment_description: Other Bets is a segment of Alphabet Inc. that includes a collection of early-stage businesses and experimental projects outside of the company's core Google Services and Google Cloud operations. This segment is reported separately and includes activities that are not part of Alphabet's main internet products and services.

Segment Profitability We report our segment results as Google Services, Google Cloud, and Other Bets. Additionally, certain costs are not allocated to our segments because they represent Alphabet-level activities. For further details on our segments, see Part I, Item 1 Business and Note 15 of the Notes to Consolidated Financial Statements included in Item 8 of this Annual Report on Form 10-K.
